backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, packages, subscribers, and monthly billing state with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend React files, hooks, utilities, pages, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen shown to unauthenticated users using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Header login/logout button integrating Internet Identity and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first-time users to enter name and phone number and save their profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, packages, subscribers, and billing data through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions to format USD currency and convert numbers to bigint.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Validates, sanitizes, and opens WhatsApp phone URLs via wa.me links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillingPage.tsx: Billing UI for viewing subscribers, selecting dates, and toggling monthly paid/due statuses.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing monthly and yearly due totals with date selectors and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/SubscribersPage.tsx: React page for listing, searching, adding, editing, and managing subscribers including WhatsApp actions and package assignment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining features, requirements, architecture notes, and pending feature requests for the accounting app.
